projects.title: MizuSkin – AI-Powered Social Skincare App
projects.description: Developed an iOS skincare app using SwiftUI, Azure Functions, and OpenAI API to provide AI-powered skincare recommendations, personalized routines, and social sharing features.
highlights: Developed an iOS skincare app using SwiftUI, Azure Functions, and OpenAI API to provide AI-powered skincare recommendations, personalized routines, and social sharing features that boosted user engagement and retention.

Designed a cloud-integrated architecture with a TypeScript (Node.js) backend, Azure Table Storage, and Azure Blob Storage, plus CI/CD pipelines, achieving scalable data handling and secure authentication.

projects.title: PhreekyNoises – Social Music Tracking App
projects.description: Full-stack music tracking web app that connects to Spotify for authentication and music history.
highlights: Implemented a full-stack web application using React, Node.js, HTML, CSS, and MySQL enabling users to track their music habits and connect to the Spotify API for authentication, music history, and friend connections.
Managed development tasks and feature implementations using an Agile Scrum board, ensuring efficient collaboration, sprint planning, and iterative improvements.

projects.title: ASL AI System
projects.description: ASL recognition system combining deep learning and a React frontend for real-time interpretation.
highlights: Developed an ASL recognition system using PyTorch and TensorFlow/Keras with a layered CNN-LSTM model trained on augmented and processed data from the Microsoft ASL dataset, leveraging OpenCV for real-time video processing.
Designed a responsive and accessible React.js frontend for real-time ASL interpretation, integrating Google's Text-to-Speech API to convert recognized gestures into spoken output.

projects.title: Airplane Crash Exploratory Data Analysis
projects.description: Exploratory data analysis and modeling of airplane crash data using Python and big data tools.
highlights: Performed large-scale analysis of airplane crash data using Python (Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn) with Apache Spark for data transformations and Hadoop for storage/retrieval, building Random Forest models to assess crash severity.

Used k-NN, K-Means clustering, and Naive Bayes for classification, leveraging Spark for parallel computation to speed model training, and designed Tableau dashboards to show crash trends, severity distributions, and safety improvements.

projects.title: Theta Tau Mu Gamma – Automated Greenhouse
projects.description: Automated greenhouse system built with embedded C++ firmware and custom sensor/control circuits.
highlights: Developed object-oriented embedded C++ firmware on an Arduino Mega to manage sensor data acquisition, relay-controlled motors, and system state across digital and analog I/O interfaces.

Designed and implemented integrated digital and analog circuits connecting moisture and light sensors, DC water pumps, relays, LED lighting, and a touchscreen display to enable autonomous environmental monitoring and control.
